column5: This Bay house is close to the beach and sits on the Bay it has great views, family-friendly activities, and restaurants and dining. Youâ€™ll love this house the kitchen is fully stocked and ready to cook, the comfy beds, the coziness, and the gas grill private patio and dock. This house is good for couples, families (with kids), big groups, and furry friends (pets). Bring your boat and tie it to the private dock.
